Title: 41761 - # Features to Look for When Buying a Digital Camera
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 features to look for in a digital camera that are necessary to create quality images. Focus on discussing the must-have features such as a quality sensor, good lenses, and settings that don't require digging around in multiple menus to find. Appeal to men who are interested in art and photography. Consider anchoring the URL in a sentence discussing the feature-rich cameras that the client creates and sells. Please try to incorporate links and products that will make the Sony link less obvious, and make sure you do not link to any Sony competitors.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: buying Sony's best digital camera
